tool_description: Tracks progress of ground-based geological surveys including area coverage, sample collection rates, and milestone completion.

planned_area_km2.description: Total planned survey area in square kilometers

target_sample_count.description: Target number of samples to collect

error_messages: Survey not found: Survey ID does not exist in tracking system.
Invalid area: Survey area must be positive number.
Invalid sample target: Sample count must be positive integer.
Invalid date: Survey start date must be valid date-time format.
Invalid duration: Duration must be between 1 and 365 days.
usage: Provide survey parameters to track progress against planned targets and generate status reports.

area_completed_km2.description: Area surveyed to date in square kilometers

samples_collected.description: Number of samples collected so far
